title: News24.com | Life in lockdown: Poverty keeps informal settlements residents from staying home
description: The status quo remains unchanged in Mamelodi, Pretoria, despite the lockdown. Children can be seen playing between shacks, groups of adults socialise with friends, while non-essential shops remain open for business.
content:
It is day five of the lockdown in Mamelodi, Pretoria. The status quo remains unchanged. 
Children can be seen playing between shacks, groups of adults socialise with friends, while non-essential shops remain open for business. There is no police presence.  … [+3647 chars]
